sentences.english: As a result, the Ontario Lottery continued to sell scratch tickets with baited hooks.
sentences.chinese: 最后，安大略博彩继续出售具有诱饵的刮彩。

sentences.english: Horse race betting in the Mainland has yet to lifting the ban.
sentences.chinese: 赛马博彩在内地至今尚未开禁。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong Jockey Club has been designated to be the operator of soccer betting.
sentences.chinese: 香港赛马会获指定为足球博彩的营运机构。

sentences.english: Football betting and football almost synchronous growth.
sentences.chinese: 足球博彩和足球几乎是同步成长的。

sentences.english: Horseracing is also one of the most biggest attractions.
sentences.chinese: 赛马是最受欢迎的博彩活动之一。

sentences.english: Instead of secretly plundering the game, he decided to go to the Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他没有秘密地抢劫乐透，而是决定找安大略博彩公司。

sentences.english: For runaway expansion in the gambling market, look east.
sentences.chinese: 要想扩充博彩业的市场，那就去东方吧。
对比一下十大博彩网学无尽头。

sentences.english: It is only right that football obtains its fair share of income from betting.
sentences.chinese: 唯有当足球从博彩中正当获益才是正确的。

sentences.english: In the January-July period, Macau's gambling revenue rose 45% from a year earlier.
sentences.chinese: 今年1至7月，澳门博彩收入较去年同期增长45%。

sentences.english: A gambling tax in Hong Kong contributes significantly to government coffers.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，博彩税为库房带来大量收益。

sentences.english: Getting inspiration from the wager, people create the jeu game.
sentences.chinese: 人们从赌博得到启示，又创造了博彩游戏。

sentences.english: Gaming revenues sank and casinos laid off staff.
sentences.chinese: 博彩收益沉没和赌场人员下岗。

definition: to throw one's energies (into an activity)/to invest one's emotions (in sth)/to bet/betting
to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
to invest in stock/to buy shares
